definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To prod , attack , or injure someone with a pike .
( ambitransitive , diving , gymnastics ) To assume a pike position .
( intransitive , gambling ) To bet or gamble with only small amounts of money .
( intransitive , Australia , New Zealand , slang ) Often followed by on or out : to quit or back out of a promise .
examples: Don’t pike on me like you did last time!

main_definition: ( transitive ) To prod , attack , or injure someone with a pike .
secondary_definitions: ( ambitransitive , diving , gymnastics ) To assume a pike position .
( intransitive , gambling ) To bet or gamble with only small amounts of money .
( intransitive , Australia , New Zealand , slang ) Often followed by on or out : to quit or back out of a promise .

definitions.definition: To depart or travel (as if by a turnpike ), especially to flee , to run away .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To equip with a turnpike .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , obsolete , British , thieves' cant ) To depart or travel (as if by a turnpike ), especially to flee , to run away .
